## Step 1
- [ ] basic transcription (HJD)
- [ ] historical normalization (HJD)
- [ ] translation (HJD)
- [ ] chinese characters in level 3 translation (HK)
- [ ] chinese characters manuscript (KO)
- [ ] expert check (HK)
## Step 2
- [ ] markup (HJD|KO)
- [ ] proof-reading (KO)

## Step 3
- [ ] TEI conversion (SS)
- [ ] GAMS upload (SS|MF)

## Step 4
- [ ] manual annotation

## Step 5 (optional)
- [ ] linguistic analysis

## Step 6
- [ ] proof-reading (all)
- [ ] imprimatur HJD
- [ ] imprimatur HK
- [ ] imprimatur Graz
